directions: In a medium bowl, cream together the cream cheese and butter until creamy. Mix in the vanilla, then gradually stir in the confectioners' sugar. Store in the refrigerator after use.
ingredients:
1/2 cup
                            - butter softend
 8 ounces
                            - cream cheese softend
 4 cups
                            - powder sugar 
 2 teaspoons
                            - vanilla extract
title: Basic Cream Cheese Frosting

directions: Line a baking sheet with waxed paper; set aside.

In a medium bowl, mix peanut butter, butter, vanilla, and confectioners' sugar with hands to form a smooth stiff dough. Add the last cup of sugar slowly. You may not needed it, if the dough is almost right sprinkle the sugar till you get it perfect.
Shape into balls using 2 teaspoons of dough for each ball. Place on prepared pan, and freeze.
Melt shortening and chocolate together in a metal bowl over a pan of lightly simmering water. Stir occasionally until smooth, and remove from heat.
Remove balls from freezer. Insert a wooden toothpick into a ball, and dip into melted chocolate. Return to wax paper, chocolate side down, and remove toothpick.
ingredients:
6 ounces
                            - baking chocolate semi-sweet
 1/2 cup
                            - butter softend
 1 1/2 cups
                            - peanut butter creamy
 4 cups
                            - powder sugar sifted
 2 tablespoons
                            - shortning 
 2 teaspoons
                            - vanilla extract
title: Buckeye Balls

directions: Cut the red potatoes up in to small chunks and add them to a large stock pot of water.
Boil the potatoes on the stove till they are tender. Drain them from the pot and add them to a large mixing bowl.
Add the butter, garlic and milk to the potato mixture. Mix well with a hand mixer till they are nice and smooth.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients:
1 dash
                            - black pepper 
 2 tablespoons
                            - butter 
 3 cloves
                            - garlic minced
 1 dash
                            - kosher salt 
 1/2 cup
                            - milk 
 1 pounds
                            - red potatos
title: Garlic Mash Taters
